management

Class ShapeInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • management.ShapeInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class ShapeInfo
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    A collection of all the shapes and their information. The ShapeInfo class implements the Observer interface.
    See Also:
    Observer, Shape, Layer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Shape[] getAllShapes()
      Returns an array of all shapes existing in the canvas.
      void update(Shape shape)
      Updates the whole information about the layers and shapes.
